items.question: How long does setup take?
items.answer: Best case — from 1 day. Depends on your process and available access.

items.question: What's needed to start?
items.answer: Be a Kaspi Pay client. Cash register account needed for receipt automation.

items.question: Does this work for Instagram/Telegram sales?
items.answer: Yes. AiPay covers invoice → payment → confirmation and you can connect bot/CRM/delivery via API.

items.question: Can AiPay withdraw money or "take access"?
items.answer: No. We don't manage money withdrawal and don't make outgoing transfers.

items.question: Are custom integrations available?
items.answer: Yes. If you need to embed AiPay into site/CRM/bot — we do it per specification (paid).

items.question: What if payment "didn't match"?
items.answer: Such cases go to "exceptions": you see them in Dashboard and resolve quickly.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly: name, phone number, business name, and payment transaction data necessary for service operation. We do not collect unnecessary personal data.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.content: We use collected data exclusively to provide AiPay services: payment verification, invoice creation, reporting, and customer support. We do not use data for marketing purposes without your consent.

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.content: Data is stored on secure servers with encryption. We apply industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or transfer your data to third parties, except when necessary to provide services (e.g., payment processing) or when required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us via WhatsApp or Telegram.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us via WhatsApp or Telegram. Contact details are available on the main page.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using AiPay services, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our services.

services.title: Services Description
services.content: AiPay provides payment automation services for Kaspi Pay: invoice creation, payment verification, order matching, and fiscal receipt automation. We do not provide money withdrawal services and do not initiate outgoing transfers.

accounts.title: User Account
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: AiPay pricing: 25,000 KZT/terminal/month (3-month minimum). The first 7 days are free trial.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: AiPay is not liable for losses caused by Kaspi system failures, incorrect data provided by users, or circumstances beyond our control. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement with 30 days notice. We reserve the right to suspend service immediately for Terms violations.
